attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop Council from giving council housing to immigrants, after only one year, of them sleeping on another immigrants floor for instance, or with another relative, as they do.

Immigrants come over and know someone over here, to put them up, they are able to receive benefits, and then after one year are eligible for council housing, which they receive, this puts a big strain on social housing for those of us in the country, preventing us moving to where we want to live. Or getting a transfer. In some councils priority is given to ethnic minorities, What is going on???????

As well as this, resources of the country are overloaded. With lack of schools, long waiting lists on the NHS, 
Lack of social housing, it is all down to the immigrants, and I do not understand why organisations have sprung up to help immigrants settle here. Where are the organisations for us Brits? and our lives. I am so angry about the policies of this country. 

Stop also everyone in the world from receiving free NHS treatment. Except for those covered by insurance, if they come over without insurance then we treat them for free. The word is spreading and has spread to the state we are in now, today.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
